correction_response: This tweet is misleading. Ted Cruz's decision to go by "Ted" instead of "Rafael" was not politically motivated but rather a personal choice made during his junior high school years to avoid teasing related to his name rhyming with popular corn chip brands, as stated in his 2015 autobiography (https://www.statesman.com/story/news/2018/08/17/politifact-why-rafael-cruz-goes-by-ted-and-robert-orourke-by-beto/986885007/). The tweet's claim about the motivations behind name changes lacks evidence and is speculative.
